definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: In 1980, the first amendment to the Marriage Law was issued.
sentences.chinese: 1980年，《婚姻法》进行了首次修订后颁布。

sentences.english: The new《Marriage Law》sets up the divorce fault compensation system in our country firstly.
sentences.chinese: 新《婚姻法》在我国首次确立了离婚过错赔偿制度。

sentences.english: Sarah: I haven't even been on a date.
sentences.chinese: 新婚姻法全文没有和快女杨洋不雅照约会过。

sentences.english: But, incompatibility was not legal grounds for divorce under the existing Marriage Law.
sentences.chinese: 但在当时的《婚姻法》中“感情破裂”尚无法律依据。

sentences.english: The visitation right was regulated in the amendments of the marriage law.
sentences.chinese: 探望权是《婚姻法》修正案中确立的一项权力。

sentences.english: Marriage laws should not provide exceptions to the civil code, Mr. Yang said.
sentences.chinese: 他在南方周末辩护道，婚姻法不应该给民法提供例外。

sentences.english: The new Law of Marriage has confirmed a new vista of ideas on marriage and family.
sentences.chinese: 新婚姻法确立了婚姻家庭观念的新境界。

sentences.english: The change is part of a new judicial interpretation of the marriage law.
sentences.chinese: 此变化是婚姻法中一项新的司法解释的一部分。

pinyin: hun1 qian2 cai2 chan3 gong1 zheng4

definition: criminal procedure/abbr. for 刑事訴訟法|刑事诉讼法
